name: WobMan Gang Game
description:
In Amazing city Wobbley Gangster try to escape and fly but he need to do tasks and missions so all you need to do is to help him to do the good job but be aware from enemys and haters they want to make you lose this game so you have your liser gun and fly tool to kill the enemys. Wobbley Gangster is a best game for gamers who enjoy this world which can play with friends and family to make fun.

Characteristics :
- 3D game
- More than 50 tasks to play
- Fun to play

What are you waiting for ? Try now

Enjoy it
